ERR_LIM: ERR_LIM: Value `limit` must be in range [1, 50).
ERR_PG: ERR_PG: Value `page` must be greater than ZERO.
ERR_QLT: ERR_QLT: Option `quality` must be a valid sequence of - "720p", "1080p", "2160p", and/or "3D".
ERR_MINR: ERR_MINR: Value `minimum_rating` must be in range [1, 10)
ERR_GNR: ERR_GNR: Option `genre` must be a valid sequence of - "comedy", "sci-fi", "horror", "romance", "action", "thriller", "drama", "mystery", "crime", "animation", "adventure", "fantasy", "comedy-romance", "action-comedy", and/or "superhero".
ERR_SBY: ERR_SBY: Option `sort_by` must be a valid value of - "title", "year", "rating", "peers", "seeds", "download_count", "like_count", or "date_added".
ERR_OBY: ERR_OBY: Option `order_by` must be a valid value of - "asc", or "desc".
ERR_RTR: ERR_RTR: Boolean option `with_rt_ratings` must be a valid boolean value.
ERR_INVID: ERR_INVID: Movie/Imdb id must be a valid integer.
ERR_WIE: ERR_WIE: Boolean option `with_images` must be a valid boolean value.
ERR_WCE: ERR_WCE: Boolean option `with_cast` must be a valid boolean value.
ERR_INVE: ERR_INVE: Value `email` must be a valid email address.
ERR_EUSE: ERR_EUSE: Email address is already in use.
ERR_INVP: ERR_INVP: Value `password` must be a valid password in the range 6-16 characters.
ERR_INVN: ERR_INVN: Value `name` must be a valid name of possibly alphanumeric, whitespaces, and periods only.
